valorant.name: Jett
valorant.description: Jett is an agile agent who bursts into battle with her Cloudburst and Updraft as she glides through the fight. A balanced duelist, Jett excels at engaging enemies and taking fights on her own terms. She runs circles around every skirmish, cutting enemies up before they even know what hit them.

valorant.name: Raze
valorant.description: Raze is an aggr,essive duelist agent who excels in flushing enemies out of entrenched positions and clearing tight spaces with a generous dose of 'boom'. Her explosive arsenal provides the team with valuable tools for flushing enemies out of position, clearing out tight spaces, and dealing massive amounts of damage in a short period of time.

valorant.name: Breach
valorant.description: Breach is a brawling sentinel agent who specializes in crowd control and engaging enemies with a stunning repertoire of abilities. He is a brawling sentinel who specializes in crowd control and engaging enemies with a stunning repertoire of abilities. Breach is a brawling sentinel who specializes in crowd control and engaging enemies with a stunning repertoire of abilities.

valorant.name: Sova
valorant.description: Sova is a recon initiator agent who provides team intel with his Recon Bolt and drones, while also providing damage with his Shock Bolt and Owl Drone.
